=C2=A0I know ya think=
 everyone should believe, and I get the Jesus voices, too, I just don't buy=
 it. The concept of not believing in a savior and being either forever dead=
 or condemned to hell just don't make any sense. EVP, and just about everyt=
hing paranormal proves that life is forever, no strings attached. I don't c=
are how much they sugar coat the stuff, it's still giving your soul, spirit=
.--freedom, to some unkonwn entity, and that ain't good. Everyone I know, w=
ith out exceptiion the was "born again" became someone else, someone evil t=
hat would back stab freinds and family for the slightest gain. Lie cheat an=
d steal. What about all the really evil, vile televangelists out there? Pre=
aching hell's fire during the day, chasing little boys and doing drugs at n=
ight.=C2=A0Try doing some reverse speech on these freaks!=C2=A0We have one =
of those evil clowns right here in Colorado. Why don't your Jesus keep evil=
 away for these little megolomainiacs? That's cuz he is
 that which you fea=
r in the ultimate diguise! Think about it, call the being from the white li=
ght evil and lure all others into darkness. It's not rocket science!
=C2=A0=

=C2=A0I have to side with Hultay, go make yourself a group just for true b=
elievers. 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0Freedom of religion is by definition freedom from r=
eligion! 
=C2=A0
F-S
